content: Set terminal title for brp watch management tools migration
Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add manual handler constants HANDLER_BRP_STOP_WATCH and HANDLER_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES to tools.rs after line 114
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding handler constants
Import constants in tool_definitions.rs: HANDLER_BRP_STOP_WATCH, HANDLER_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES, TOOL_BRP_STOP_WATCH, DESC_BRP_STOP_WATCH, TOOL_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES, DESC_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES
Create get_brp_tools() function in tool_definitions.rs with brp_stop_watch and brp_list_active_watches definitions
Add tools.extend(get_brp_tools()) to get_all_tools() in tool_definitions.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding tool definitions
Import HANDLER_BRP_STOP_WATCH and HANDLER_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES in tool_generator.rs
Add HANDLER_BRP_STOP_WATCH case to generate_local_handler() in tool_generator.rs
Add HANDLER_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES case to generate_local_handler() in tool_generator.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after updating tool generator
Remove register_tool() function from brp_stop_watch.rs (lines 14-26)
Remove Tool import from brp_stop_watch.rs
Remove schema import from brp_stop_watch.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after cleaning up brp_stop_watch.rs
Remove register_tool() function from brp_list_active.rs (lines 17-23)
Remove Tool import from brp_list_active.rs
Remove schema import from brp_list_active.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after cleaning up brp_list_active.rs
Remove watch::brp_stop_watch::register_tool() from registry.rs
Remove watch::brp_list_active::register_tool() from registry.rs
Remove brp_stop_watch handler case from registry.rs match statement
Remove brp_list_active_watches handler case from registry.rs match statement
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after updating registry
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues (no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Code review: Task subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review suggested changes from code review with user
